Title: WinForms Shape Control
Description: A simple WinForms control that will display a shape (rectange, triangle, star, curve, polygon, etc.) with a number of different fill and outline effects, including text. Nice for spicing up a form.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple WinForms control that will display a shape (rectange, triangle, star, curve, polygon, etc.) with a number of different fill and outline effects, including text. Nice for spicing up a form.

Initially created to add some "pop" to a WinForms application and ended up being more to help demonstrate the power of creating custom controls. Some interesting stuff in here so I'm posting to share my learnings.
